toys.name: LEGO Classic Creative Bricks
toys.description: Build a world of endless creative possibilities with this classic LEGO set. Includes a variety of colorful bricks and pieces.

toys.name: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon
toys.description: Recreate epic space battles with the iconic Millennium Falcon from the Star Wars saga. Includes minifigures of Han Solo, Chewbacca, and more.

toys.name: LEGO Technic Bugatti Chiron
toys.description: Experience the engineering marvel of the Bugatti Chiron supercar with this advanced LEGO Technic set. Features working gears, pistons, and sleek design.

toys.name: LEGO Friends Heartlake City Resort
toys.description: Join the LEGO Friends in their Heartlake City Resort and enjoy water slides, pool, beach area, and more. Includes mini-doll figures and accessories.

toys.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes Iron Man Hall of Armor
toys.description: Build Tony Stark's iconic Hall of Armor and display his suits. Includes Iron Man minifigures and interchangeable armor suits.

toys.name: LEGO Creator Expert Taj Mahal
toys.description: Recreate the majestic Taj Mahal with this highly detailed LEGO set. Perfect for architecture enthusiasts and LEGO collectors.

toys.name: LEGO Harry Potter Hogwarts Castle
toys.description: Step into the magical world of Harry Potter with this Hogwarts Castle LEGO set. Features iconic locations and minifigures from the series.

toys.name: LEGO City Deep Space Rocket and Launch Control
toys.description: Embark on a space adventure with this LEGO City rocket and launch control set. Includes astronauts, space station, and rocket.

toys.name: LEGO Creator Expert Ford Mustang
toys.description: Build and display a classic Ford Mustang model with this detailed LEGO Creator set. Features realistic design and customizable options.

toys.name: LEGO Technic Porsche 911 GT3 RS
toys.description: Experience the engineering excellence of the Porsche 911 GT3 RS with this advanced LEGO Technic set. Features authentic details and mechanisms.

toys.name: LEGO Disney Cinderella's Castle
toys.description: Recreate the magical world of Cinderella with this stunning LEGO Disney Castle set. Includes iconic characters and intricate details.

toys.name: LEGO Architecture Statue of Liberty
toys.description: Build a replica of the iconic Statue of Liberty with this LEGO Architecture set. Celebrate the spirit of freedom and architectural marvel.

toys.name: LEGO Super Mario Adventures with Mario Starter Course
toys.description: Jump into the world of Super Mario with this interactive LEGO set. Play levels, collect coins, and defeat enemies with LEGO Mario.

toys.name: LEGO Ninjago City
toys.description: Immerse yourself in the world of Ninjago with this highly detailed LEGO Ninjago City set. Features multiple levels and minifigures.

toys.name: LEGO Ideas International Space Station
toys.description: Discover the wonders of space with this LEGO Ideas set featuring the International Space Station. Includes astronaut minifigures.

toys.name: LEGO Harry Potter Diagon Alley
toys.description: Explore the magical shopping street of Diagon Alley with this extensive LEGO Harry Potter set. Features iconic shops and minifigures.
